name: When Bytey Met Stringy: A Love Story
name_original: When Bytey Met Stringy: A Love Story
description:
A tale of FIERY love, lust, and loss between two variables lost in a UE4 Blueprint File.

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move and Jump. Everything else will be explained in the game.

Game made for the June 2016 Unreal Engine 4 Game Jam. Game and Music created by Randolph Espejo. Music was written and recorded during the Game Jam.

Follow @randymiroir . Subscribe to Youtube Channel LoveFactorySweatShop.

Thanks for Playing!
